post.author: 박해옥

comment.author: 임기순
comment.content: I had my 25 years old furnace replaced with anothe Lenox furnace. The installer did an excellent job. They are Lenox owned. Price seems to be reasonable. And the furnace itself is very quiet and working well. Here is the dealer in Oakville. If you need more info, please contact me. http://www.serviceexperts.ca/Locations/ON/Abbey_Air_Service_Experts_Oakville_ON_L6L5T7.aspx

post.content: 윈도우를 갈고,히터랑 물탱크(20년 이상됨)을 최종 audit전에 바꾸어 볼까 하는데,어디가 조건/가격이 좋은지 아시는 분,share부탁드려요~~~~
post.title: Furnace/Water heating Tank 교환정보요...
